input.sentences: we were so excited for the concert and we had front row seats ...
i wanted to watch everyone | except the lead singer ...
however | he was the best of the bunch .
i watched him play the guitar ...
and | i zoomed in on his solo because he was amazing .
output.sentences: We had great seats for the performance.
The lead singer was very talented.
There was a big crowd at the performance.
We enjoyed the guitar as much as the singing.
He ended the performance with a fabulous solo.
